skills.name: Vorpal Sword
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places an extra hit if the target has any active skills on cooldown. Each hit has an 80% chance of decreasing the duration of a random buff on the target by 1 turn.

skills.name: Clockwork Cyclone
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. 75% chance of increasing the cooldowns of all enemy skills by 2 turns. 75% chance of decreasing Turn Meter by 15% (or 30% if a skill is maxed).

skills.name: Queenslayer
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy, ignores 20% DEF. If the initial target is killed, also attacks the enemy with the lowest HP (also ignores 20% DEF).

skills.name: Tick Tock
skills.description: [Passive] Whenever Alice attacks, inflicts 3% bonus damage per turn remaining on all of the target’s skill cooldowns. [Active] Resets the cooldown of one of Alice’s skills each time she kills an enemy (once per skill).

skills.name: Aura
skills.description: Increases Ally ATK in all battles by 30%.
